content.detailedDescription: I come from mn where we become accustom to seeing strange things in the sky. i was getting ready for bed and closing the window in our game room which faces west ( with north west view). i glanced out to the sidewalk and seen the ufo sitting in the sky. it was so bright. i yelled for my husband to come see it (he has never seen one before - city kid all his life). he came in and could not believe his eyes. i told him that was how ufos look where i come from. it was difficult to tell if it was just glowing or pulsating as it was surprising to see here. it sat stationary. felt like it was watching us - eerie feeling. we starred at it for a minute or more (not sure time) and the street light to the left of our home (across the street) began to blink and struggle to light. we glanced at the street light and my husband commented that it was blinking. looked back at the ufo and it was gone - no sign of it. checked ten minutes later before going to bed and no sign of the ufo.
content.summary: Round, glowing, white disc with bright red on bottom - appeared fairly close

content.detailedDescription:
This is an incident that has happend 2 times and has happend again, last time at about dec 23 one light was in a position of about 100 to 50 feet south of our property in our hill on our back property and it was like if someone had a flash light in the trees and was walking up there, but it was odd it didn't move for about 10-12 sec lighting up and fading out, then it stopped and about 3 sec later i had to of jumped 400 to 500 feet north and sat in a position half a mile away from the top of the hill and after that it stopped again and 5 sec later it exited the atmosphere in a j like direction north from where it was at, this morning it was moving with a flash fade motion and is going towards whats called mt. godfry,

today 5/14/12 at around 11:30 to 12:30 pm a friend saw another but it had a sun like shape and it ascended and descended behind our hill. before coming over.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Fading lights seen by 2 in the hills on property.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my nightly walk. as i was headed south torwards downtown i looked out to the west and there was literally 20 to 25 orbs of lights in a line sttreaching from the north to south in groups of threes. as the each group get over the skyliine of downtown seattle the lights would dimm out and you could see the circular form of the objects and this went on from one group to the next til they all reach the downtown skyline and what was weird was that there was a single object that was at the end of the fleet and it turned and went northwest as the rest continued south. now i heard of seeing 1 or 2 objects but a fleet of 20 to 25. unreal.
content.summary: A fleet of ufos

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter and i were outside sitting on the front porch steps, when we heard a strange rumble sound coming from the east. we both thought it was a low flying plane at first, then we were able to see two white/blue light that seemed to pulse up and down. as it got closer we knew it was not a plane by the low rumbling sound it made, and the two lights in front were hanging down from it, almost as long as a telephone pole. 
we could not see any type of body for this craft. as it slowly passed over us, i flashed my flashlight at it three times. it then turned on a third light, gold in color, located behind and in the middle of the first two. it looked as though there could have been five feet or more between the lights. after that we stepped out into the street and started walking in the direction that it flew away in. 
it never really moved very fast it seemed to just glide away almost. as it drifted off into the distance, maybe ten miles ahead of us, it stopped blinking it's lights, and just went out of sight. we were not frightened by it, more amazed than anything, and thought it was cool that it seemed to respond to my flashlight by turning it's third light on.
content.summary: Flew above our heads and responded to a flashlight by turning on third gold light

content.detailedDescription: At about 8:30pm lookin to venus because it is so bright right now i noticed 2 planes then light from venus. i thought it was a satilite until the light came under clouds revealing an oval shape solid object. it looked as it were following the planes. i then saw another plane that looked to be behind the object. at this point i thought it may be a millitary experiment. i called to some kids playing ball to look. they didnt see it at first but saw the object fly straight for a little while then zigzagged and went upward leavin a space in the clouds. one more plane flew thru the flight path and the sky cleared
content.summary: Oval shape object seen in cleveland coming as if from venus

content.detailedDescription:
I was backing out of my drive onto a road that runs north-south through conway, ar, and while looking to my right (south) to check for traffic i noticed a string of lights similar to how flares may appear, or aircraft in very close formation flight, but these were red lights, were bright, were constant, and were too large to be aircraft lights without their being heard. as i watched them the arc formation of lights began to shift closer to one another. there were 4 lights that moved close together forming a diamond momentarily (indicative of a helicopter or aircraft losing altitude rapidly in formation flight) and one additional light nearer (higher on the horizon). they changed their formation while moving north, toward me. at this point i was out of my car and walking toward the lights, south along the street. the way the lights changed formation they appeared to hover and move slowly as a helicopter might, but there were no white anti-collision lights. all of the lights were a bright red with a slight tinge of orange and after the movement of the lights occurred some began to grow dim. as i walked closer i expected they would soon pass directly overhead or nearby, but by the time i reached a tall group of pines that were obscuring my view all of the lights had vanished. 
i am a former army helicopter pilot, chief warrant officer (retired 2007), and what i saw does not make sense. because of the size of the lights i should have been able to hear the aircraft, were they rotor or fixed wing, but i heard nothing. it was a cloudless night sky as many stars shone brightly surrounding the area where i viewed the lights. after walking back to my car i immediately looked at the clock and it showed 2118hrs. i estimated it took me about 5 minutes to walk to the spot where i realized the lights had vanished and return to my vehicle.
content.summary: 5 red-orange orbs flew nearby but made no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
Date and time: approx. 23:10, may 5th (night of super moon)
location: ottawa, ontario, canada (suburb of orleans)
witnesses: 3 saw orange ball of light in the northeast, 2 saw the black triangle fly overhead - heading southwest.

departing friend's home, standing in his driveway looking up at the super moon directly in front of us.  moon was high, quite bright and appeared normal in size.  turning to our left, facing the northeast, we saw a bright orange light - it was hard to tell if it was stationary or not.  i thought it was a satellite being illuminated by the sun below the horizon, but it was not moving fast enough.  i then thought it could be a flare, again, it appeared rather stationary - and, no smoke trails or arc in the trajectory of the light.  the light then blinked out.  my friend suggested it was just a plane - but no plane i know has orange approach lights.

as we continued to look in the direction of the object, we could make out something approaching.  even as the moon was bright, nothing was reflected off the surface of the object.  as it flew over us, we could clearly see a large black triangle.  it progressed southwest in total silence.  there were absolutely no lights, no strobes, nothing.  i want to say i recall some circles on the bottom side of the object, but my memory  has faded.  

the size of the object was hard to determine.  it appeared to be about an index finger, may a bit longer in length.  speed was about cruising speed of an airliner.  again hard to just size without judging altitude.  i am guessing in the 1000ft to 3000ft range. a total guess as i don't have a frame of reference.

our assumption is that this was some sort of us spy plane, but nothing comes to mind.  it certainly did not appear to be the supposed tr3b - with no lights on the bottom, but who knows.

we thought the orange glow might have been the object re-entering the atmosphere, but, it would have had to slow down and decrease altitude dramatically in seconds if that were the case.

total mystery.  ideas or opinions welcome.
content.summary: Orange light - black triangle over ottawa

content.detailedDescription: Well i've been watching the ufo shows on tv again today and saw the english roswell episode and wondered if anyone was interested in what we saw several years ago. sorry i didn't tell you all when it happened but i just learned what mufon is and does from the tv shows. i'm sure there must have been much better reports on what we saw because we seemed to be very far away from this. anyway, the light looked starlike or like a distant flood light pointed our way, over and much further away from the pine trees which were about .5 miles south of us. we thought this light which later ended up being about 3 different ones, well we figured they were several miles away, maybe 5 to 7 making the lights quit and small. anyway this original light would move around aimlessly around kinda a little like maybe could have been something like a fast small helicopter could do from this many miles away but then would hover very still it would traverse on a horizontal plane almost instantly. it also did this in different directions as well but mostly horizontal making it seem like it was having fun and looking at different parts of earth. there is no way anything on earth can do what we saw unless and i mean this is the only way this is earth tech. the only way i know of is if this was done using multiple inviable lasers (most are)at different points on the ground that would triangulate into a visible light and could then move in a way as to make this small light travel almost instantly and stop about instantly. i would think that college kids with the right robotic arms or cnc tech hooked up to the right lasers and might be able to do this so i assume this is what we saw but if not them we indeed saw a ufo. because nothing we have ever put in the sky can maneuver from a deed hover to hundreds if not thousands of miles an hour and stop about and almost but just slightly less than instant but nearly instantly stop and go like which what we witnessed. so again a hologram in the sky is the only humanly way possible i know of to do what we saw. it would also slowly drift around aimlessly at a very slow speed, stop, then zip a to b near instantly. it went to the other light and after a few hours the two left one after the other and the second at different but slower speeds as they accelerated together and then we noticed a third light went with them much much dimmer and i maybe the only one to have seen the third since it was so dim. i will add if these were non earth ufos although they appeared to us to be over the horizon they might have also been much further and in space since it's very hard to judge distance from a small point of light and when they left they did leave in about a 45 degree angle from the horizon in an up/right angle from the horizon and they didn't seem to get much if any larger. these lights did look a lot like the stars around them. so i will search this site now and see if anyone may have seen these things up closer or closer than us. i've never seen anything like this before and have not since and i don't expect to ever see anything like this again unless either the same guys re-run the hologram program prank or the non earth things come back. again these are the only two options because humans can't make air born objects move like this. we can only do this with some kind of hologram laser light show. this was my wife and i and also my mom and dad and uncle on my dads boat on lake huron looking south. we were located about 30 miles or so north east of mackinaw island looking south. i'm the only one that thinks it could have been an earth based hologram prank but when i asked everyone else in the boat no one had any idea what they were looking at my dad originally said...Helicopter. i quickly said do you really think a chopper can move like that. he looked a while longer and said i have no idea what that is. and my dad is a retired air force pilot and has flown everywhere and has never seen anything weird like this before or after. i will add i had a very weird feeling like it since most of the time we thought it was just one i had a weird feeling that it might zip all the way to us and almost instantly be larger and up close and in person to us. so i guess i'm not positive this was a hologram prank cause i think i was joking around and said what if whatever that is zips all the way over hear in a second and is a big ufo and i think as a said that realized holy crap what if it did do that then was a little scary. but it seemed to be kinda playful in nature, whatever it was like it was bored while the second one just stayed motionless mostly. clearly it was the one trying to learn or do something more than the one flitting all over. i'm repeating. sorry ok i'm done. oh and if your wondering what we were doing so late on a boat, we were rock base fishing with jitterbugs casting at the rocks around 11:30 to 1:30 they will bite on them. they usually only bite when it's overcast but i do remember seeing some stars out. thanks for reading this sorry for typos and rambling on, lol.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Star or distant flood light that could go point a to point b almost instantly

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i and the kids were on the beach at sunset with 25+ other tourists.  right after the sun set ( we were all taking pictures) my wife says "what are those?"  i looked up, as well as other people.  we all saw 2 objects just sitting there.  they were very reflective and slightly changed shape but did not move.  i said "take photos now!!!!!!"  the objects stayed stationary, with 15-20 mph gulf winds.  they then, after 10-15 min started to "phase out."  that's all i can say to explain it, they just started disappearing......Took about 30 secs to vanish.  the one on the left appeared to jet upward right before it disappeared.  myself, my wife and many other people were astonished by what we all saw......One guy said "now you don't see that everyday?"  i was just speechless......We have never seen unexplained objects ever.
content.summary: 2 reflective glowing objects

content.detailedDescription: On sunday may 13, 2012, a bright sunny and clear afternoon, while driving down a busy street, i noticed what appeared to be a very large object moving along the horizon several miles in front of me. the object was square/rectangular, bright white, and appeared almost pillow-like, or like a large sheet. it moved left to right in a straight path along the horizon at an unknown speed (as it was probably 5 miles away), but it appeared to move slowly. it also hovered several times, and possibly reversed it's direction. at the time i felt this was extremely strange and unlike anything i had ever seen before. my wife was with me and was puzzled by what we were seeing. i was forced to go with the flow of traffic and lost sight of the object after about 3-4 minutes.
content.summary: From several miles away during daylight hours i observed a very large bright white square/rectangle (appeared pillow- or sheet-like) moving left to right in a slow straight path, then hover, close to the horizon.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from huntington lake off highway 168 in california. it was about five am and i was headed home from a camping trip. i got to the saw mill in auberry around 5:00 am and noticed all the lights. as i turned around the many bends in the road i continued to see a light that i thought was pretty bright to be coming from the saw mill, especially so since i'd passed the saw mill about a half an hour before i noticed this one light.  i kept looking out my side window to see if it was still there and it was.  this light stayed exactly where it was except i continued to see it for a good 20 minutes beyond where i could have seen any lights from the mill.  not long after i realized i was way too far past the mill for this thing to be one of the mills lights i realized it was a ufo.  i started talking to it because i did not want to be abducted.  i then started to yell inside my car, "i know what you are! i know you want to kidnap me! if i feel any change in the air, or the car, or the wheels, i'll drive right off the cliff and kill myself!! back off!"  and i started speeding up and driving recklessly to show them i meant business.  after only about five minutes of doing that the light was suddenly gone.  just gone.  i did not see it leave or flare out, it just vanished.  i didn't have any missing time and no after effects except for being scared and grateful that they left.  this was in july 1990.  i was 35 years old, was not drunk and don't have any history of being abducted in that past.  i have had one other sighting that was significant but no abductions.  no one from my family has been abducted either.  this sighting seemed to me to be a chance encounter.
content.summary: Followed by bright white round light that stayed exactly above and off to the driver's side of my car.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside having a cigarette, 1st object appeared slowly behind thin cloud cover, appearing to pulse; another appeared several hundred feet away, visible through a hole in the clouds. the clouds quickly dispersed, but the lights remained, disappearing and re-appearing randomly.  the light to my left eventually turned into a small prick of light,  and then appeared as a dim star before disappearing,  the light to my left kept the same shape and just faded out quickly.  we live in the flightpath of heathrow airport and as such, are accustomed to seeing aeroplanes regularly - these were certainly not aeroplanes! at least 3 aeroplanes were visible during the sighting.  the objects made no absolutely noise whatsoever.
content.summary: 2 pencil-objects, emerald green glow

content.detailedDescription: on 12-may-2012 i arrived home around 11:00 pm (pst) when i happened to glance up, looking south from nora ave, and i noticed several groups of yellow-orange lights. i witnessed a group of 5 lights float up the ground in a single file fashion, floating upwards for approx 2-300 feet and then float off travelling up and southward. there are several groups of trees and buildings between myself and the objects' origin, so i was unable to determine the exact point of origin. i noticed that they didn't disintegrate, but simply floated up and away until they were just gone. that is, they floated off into the distance, both up and southward. they didn't appear to be under deliberate or intelligent control as many high profile ufos are reported but i certainly couldn't identify them. i thought perhaps balloons with some sort of incendiary properties (flares?), but i did see one simply stop and hover for a few minutes before floating up and away as the others. there were multiple groups of these objects and this happened over a 15-20 minute duration, maybe longer. i finally got bored and went inside. i must note that i attempted to video, but the street lights impeded my camera's picture and the objects in my video were not visible. i was disappointed that there was no mention of this in any of the news reports.
content.summary: Spokane glowing lights/fireballs (?)

content.detailedDescription: Just saw from my back patio while gazing almost straight up in the sky, what looked like white ball either very small or very high in the sky moving very fast, but i think below the cloud level. seemed to be above or higher in elevation than a near by vapor trail left by a passing jet, but below or lower than the highest clouds it passed in front of. the sky was pretty clear, with a few low level puffy clouds, and maybe just some very high elevation thin clouds. the object was a very small white light or something reflecting the sun. i would have thought it was a satellite moving across the sky, the way it was moving speed wise, and the straight line it moved in, but it was in the middle of the day, and iv'e never seen anything move this fast, this high up during the day. not a jet for sure. i lost sight of it when it's path took it behind some trees in my back yard. that's it!I've just never seen anything like this during the day.
content.summary: What looked like white ball very small or very high in the sky moving very fast below the cloud level

content.detailedDescription: I was home watching t.V. when my wife came home from washing clothes with our kids. the kids came in the house and shortly after my wife began screaming for my oldest daughter who is 8, then she came running up the stairs, into the house and told me to hurry up and come outside. i thought there was a car accident outside from the way she was acting. when i came out she was standing in front of our front door pointing to the north in the sky. she asked me what it was. i seen probably about 6 bright red lights which seemed to be floating stationary. they were blinking, and formed a diagonal line with the highest one being northwest, and the lowest one being southeast in the sky. i was startled at first because i there were so many and never seen anything like it. they started slowly moving away from each other. the gap between them became greater and greater as the diagonal line became longer and longer. the lights at first were big and bright but they bacame small and dull which made me believe they were moving away from us (they were definitely moving up). as we watched, she told me when she first noticed them they were all clumped together, and she thought it was very odd looking. thats when she ran in the house to get someone else to see them. towards the end of the sighting i could only see the two lowest lights, the others had disappeared behind foliage from a tree that sits in our front yard and the next door apartment building which is north from us. that is when a white light came straight across the horizon (very fast compared to the movement of the red lights) from the direct of o'hare airport which we believe was a plane. it was headed right for the two red lights, one was above and the other below. before it reached the closest red light they both disappeared and the airplane continued on its path. we stood there for a second while she asked what it was, i told her the only thing it might have been is flares but they were in an almost perfect diagonal line and they blinked on and off, and they did'nt fall down, they moved up. we have lived here all our lives near o'hare airport and see planes flying in and out everyday, all day, but never seen anything like this. maybe they could have been helicopters with red lights but i've never seen helicopters fly a formation like this. who ever was responsible was intelligent. every year in chicago there's an air and water show where palnes and boats perform, and entertain. this reminded me of that. i know other people had to have seen it also. who ever was responsible was putting on a show for people to see, they were saying look at this. they wanted to bee seen. i don't think they were balloons. i told her to get out her digital camera but she said she had too much saved on it and couldn't take any videos or pictures. i couldn't stop thinking about it for the rest of the night. afterwards i thought about the timing of this. the nato summit is happening here in chicago this week. i have a feeling this has something to do with it.
content.summary: Red lights flashing floated up and away forming a diganol line after being clumped together.

content.detailedDescription: On 5/12/12 i was driving e/bound on the 91 freeway near lakeview saw to my left over anahiem hills 3 shimmering objects holding a triangle pattern. i pulled onto the soft shoulder with a bout 5 other cars got out and watched as the craft(s) moved north directly overhead. the first craft was a triangle with an orange ball in the center, the second one appeared as a cigar shape with lines on the bottom...The 3rd seemed to tumble as it moved all three at times gave off the appearance of mercury. one at times appeared gelatinous and would give off, not a reflection but an illumination as to be partially made from mercury, like the reflective silver material used by nasa...How ever that illumination did appear to change shape all three of these at times appeared to tumble. the two that flew directly over head were definitely aircraft of some kind...I assume the third also was. i saw these with others as there was a lot of traffic on the freeway...We have alot of air traffic out of john wayne airport so its not remarkable to see planes holding patterns...But these moved unlike any craft i have ever seen..They also did not dissapear..But continued n/e over yorba linda at now an extremely high altitude holding the same form. i do not believe in life on other planets and am a skeptic of all things mysterious...But feel fortunate to have seen these things
content.summary: 3 shimmering triangle craft moving slowly east then north for a bout 10 min

content.detailedDescription: I was in my neighbors back yard. walking towards my house, i am always star gazing, i noticed movement out of the corner of my eye. i stopped and observed the object make small circles. then it moved west, stopped, moved north all in straight lines. i phoned my neighbor and told him to come outside to look. he brought out a powerful flashlight. i told him which light it was that was making moves. he shined the light on the object and asked if that was the one i was reffering to. i said yes, to which the object dimmed out and appeared in another area of the sky. he spotted it this time approxamately 3-5 inches from where it "dimmed" out. it moved west in a straight line then dimmed out again. we watched for a couple of more minutes but the object did not re-appear. clouds were moving into the area, so he went inside. i kept waiting for the sky to re-open but it was too far and few between openings. i've been waiting for a long time to see a ufo, it was awesome!
content.summary: Observed a light in the night sky, no twinkling, no lights flashing, no noise, no satellight!

content.detailedDescription:
Recorded 09/10/2011 location zemun, tosin bunar 17:55,
i recorded the mobile phone, with the naked eye it was much better to see clearly that a neindentifikovani flying object, and the tape can not be seen with the naked eye and could see that he had as a dish or something that looked like as an example string, but for two lengths of its width, it is not seen in the video, but live to see, a very thin was because it looked like a dish, or tell you what, this is already vidjam third day in a row, almost at the same time, but today this small better to see it as it is today came down lower than these days, and i even managed to catch the phone to
content.summary: Recorded 09/10/2011 location zemun, tosin bunar 17:55,

content.detailedDescription: Tonight at 5/14/2012 at 2am est me and my fiancee took our dogs out side to use the bathroom in our back yard. we went outside to feel the cool air for a bit and when my husband looked up in to the sky he noticed some bright orange fieball looking circles flying from south to north up into the atmoshere. he told me and i looked up and saw that there were 2. 1 was directly behind the other flying in coorindation. he was thinking they were moving farley fast and very high in the sky. a few mins later we wnt back out to get the dogs and their was another one east of the 1st 2 we seen moving upwards twords the sky the same way. we waitied and watched some more and finally saw 1 last on in the same location as the 1st 2 but it was moving east to west and alil north but kinda doing a swiggly back and forth. they all only lasted for a few mins until they disapered into the atmosphere. i am not big on alien life comming to visit us but i have never seen anything like this before. i am hoping to gather some answers posting on here and i niotced some other people have made comments about the same thing but different dates. times and locations.
content.summary: Saw 4 fireballs ascend into the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Myself and a friend were driving passed pontoosuc lake,in pittsfield, ma, 01201, around 10:25 pm, when we noticed two bight orbs, red-dish orange in color, dancing around each other. they looked like  they were about a half a mile or so above the the city of pittsfield. the sky was clear with stars visable.


we watched while driving for about thirty seconds; then pulled over to one of the lake parking lots off of rt 7, heading south.  they danced around each other, similar to two dogs when they meet. they were not doing it too quickly...But they moved as being comondeered intellegently.

after stopping, i took out my phone to record a video.  just as i started trying to focus on them, they quickly jutted away in separate directions.  there was no sound, no blinking lights, no form, just light. unfortunetely, we were unable to get a video.

if you need further information, please don't hesitate to contact me.


rachael cathlene bassett
content.summary: Two reddish orange bright object dancing around each other in the sky above city near lake.

content.detailedDescription: It was in the south west area of the sky. i was standing outside and was looking up to take notice of the nights sky and then it appeared to look like a star but really red in color and it would move. at first slowly then i was not sure if i was seeing things so i grabbed my husband and we stood outside for about twenty minutes to half hour. at times it appeared what we were looking at also had something above it hovering. it would hover then move in one direction then stop and go back the other way. it would grow bright then dim.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red star like hovering then changing directions and back again

content.detailedDescription: I was walking the family dog behind my house which has an amazing veiw of the sussquehanna river valley. i noticed my dog starting to bark and pull at his lead, then up over the river i saw a huge blue light that was flying along the river and then followed the terrain up towards my house. the light never..Not once came above the tree tops...And was moving fast. it seemed to come with in a hundred feet of my house, it stopped and hovered behind the trees with no noise. then i noitced something in the tree lines moving towards the light, then as the light streaked through thte trees out of sight i got a mental picture...Words almost..I saw a qick flash of our solar system with the word uranus...Ringing in my ears...For days all i could think about was uranus, i did research, i googled uranus, i wikied uranus and i thought of nothing but uranus..I actually felt like that movie with richard dryfuss where he obsesses about devil's peak...Except i was going crazy over uranus...The feeling of uranus have since subsided...And i feel normal except for a ramdom thought here or there about uranus...My wife actually was concerned with my facination about uranus...I had thoughts and actually wished to see uranus..I was totally..Uneqivacally ..Obsessed with uranus.
content.summary: Lights came over mountain near house...I saw things in the tree line - mental communications?

content.detailedDescription: Well my family (younger brother, younger sister, and mother) were all driving 35 south heading back from the forum, when my younger brother pointed out a strange object; it was a silver elongated aircraft, bullet-like in its shape, and it was pretty high up in the sky, about 900ft up, traveling very fast in the southwest direction. the time was approximately 8:10 pm when this was pointed out. about a minute later it suddenly shifted, and instead of the silver bullet shape it had previously, it shifted to an orb-like shape and was reflecting an unnatural red-orange glow, not bright enough to be a star, but it was metallic looking and certainly reflected more light than the average helicopter. we followed it down to o'connor rd, and stopped briefly at a motel to better observe it from our car, but then the orb suddenly became plural as another one appeared seemingly out of thin air. it changed direction soon after that and we followed it to a valero on o'connor rd and we stepped out of the vehicle to follow it more, and it was about this time (about 8:19) that there was not one, but three orbs all reflecting the same orange-red glow, and all looked to be approximately the same size, and it changed direction once more before all three orbs suddenly changed back to the original silver color and then vanished. and right after it vanished, a plane zoomed into our line of sight.
content.summary: It was moving extremely fast, like the velocity earth's rotation. then it changed direction, 2 more appeared, then they all disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: This siting was actually by a friend who i doubt will follow through with the report like i asked, so im doing it incase he doesnt. he witnessed a pillow shaped object that at first he said he thought was a blimp or balloon. when he finally focused on it he realized it was pillow shaped. he said there was a con-trail in the sky also that i  believe he said partly obscured the object at times and he was not sure if it had left the trial. he said he was not under the influence of any drugs or alcahol. he said it was real big, bigger than a plane, moving real fast, flying lower than any plane would. it was flying over homes in our city nieghborhood.  he wanted to get his phone out to take a picture but said he did not have time. i see no reason to doubt his claim. at this point he only says it was an unidentified flying obect, not necessarly extraterestrial.
content.summary: Pillow like object moving very fast in one direction

content.detailedDescription: I was on my deck looking east towards hartford and saw a very bright white flashing light flying across bristol, the fastest object ive ever seen. no sound or shape what so ever, just the strobing light. got to about the hartford area in 5 seconds and took an abrupt right turn towards the south and it was out of range in less than 8 seconds total. it was not the flashing towers in plainville and it wasn't a plane. im planning on making a full report tomorrow.
content.summary: Strobing lights flew at very high speed across bristol and took a right turn towards the south

content.detailedDescription: I was on my deck looking east towards hartford and saw a very bright white flashing light flying across bristol, the fastest object ive ever seen. no sound or shape what so ever, just the strobing light. got to about the hartford area in 5 seconds and took an abrupt right turn towards the south and it was out of range in less than 8 seconds total. it was not the flashing towers in plainville and it wasn't a plane. im planning on making a full report tomorrow.
content.summary: Strobing lights flew at very high speed across bristol and took a right turn towards the south

content.detailedDescription:
I am not sure what i saw, it was unidentified, it was flying and it was something so on that basis alone i classify what i saw as a ufo. 
 
on december 24, 2011 at 1:34 am.  i was driving north on hwy 99w in oregon approximately a mile north of twin buttes dr, linn county, oregon.
  
the object in the front resembled an oversized and reversed jet engine the front glowed red.  the object was ���cigar��� shaped approximately 30 feet in diameter and 100 -170 feet long. it was traveling at a very high rate of speed and made absolutely no noise. 

i stepped out of my car because i thought the object was going to crash as i exited my car i noted the time on my dash clock.  instead as it approached the hills to the west it turned up into the clouds and disappeared.  

as i was getting back into my car i noticed a man getting into a small (ranger type) truck about 100 yards ahead of me, apparently he was reacting to the same thing.  the man in the truck and i pulled alongside each other and he asked if i had seen what he had seen.  i affirmed his sighting and he left.
content.summary: Mysterious object flew directly infront of my car.

content.detailedDescription: I had gone out back of my work place at around 9ish for a quick smoke break. my place of work is on the banks of the sussquehanna river in berwick pa. i noticed what looked like a helicopter search light coming down the river about 40 feet obove the water and about 100 yards from where i was. i noticed the light was bright- almost blue and hurt your eyes to look at it. as it got closer i thought they were looking for a boat or something thats when i noticed that it was silent - not a sound. it shot past dollar tree and kept going down river illuminating everything. right before a bridge it rose up and stayed in a crease of the mountain ( these are large mtns by the way) and shot right up and over the mountain staying the same distance from the ground - this was fast and made no sounds at all. when it went over the mountain i noticed a few cars stopped on the bridge and they stayed for a while...I can tell you that this couldn't have been a helicopter because it stayed just below the tree line and it covered about 3 miles in less that 30 seconds and made no noise..That was the spookiest part for me. was the dead silence as this light came down the river and over the mountains..
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Lighted orb flew atop river then over mtn.

content.detailedDescription:
In 1990 i was in morocco.  the last week of march, sandy after midnight, i was in the country area. i saw a yellow square air craft was landed front of me about 20 meters with a bright yellow headlight. its size it was 6 meters or seven meters square, it���s hgt it was 2 meters. it
came 2 meters close to me in my left side. i also saw two  flying dishes  stand and stay 6 meters over me, one over one space between them at least one meter. the flying dishes
started to shine a bright white light on me for 5 - 10 min. then i heard somebody talked to me
a pure arabic language for 2-3 min, this voice from the flying dishes i thought they were angeles. the square a yellow air craft made an injection    in my body because suddenly
i was unconscious. after 3 or 4 hours i found my self same place but every thing was gone
but i felt some thing in my body .For four years i saw them only at night. they would try to throw me into black holes. now i realize that they are not angeles , they are aliens .
so when i was unconscious they made in my body the aliens (green staff).After   realizing
this, i left sraghna and i went to the city casablanca.
two years later, i came to united states of america.
last december suddenly i lost my hearing of left ear until now.
instill hear them and they torture me until today.
content.summary: I have the aliens (green staff) in side my body

content.detailedDescription:
Was sitting out on the front porch with some friends.  i was facing east, the others were facing west towards the house.  i saw a large blue flash in the sky that lasted about 1 second.  i told my friends about it, it was a large flash that sustained about 1 second.  i commented it looked like a blue explosion.  similar to something you see from a nuclear event.
then about 2 minutes later i saw the glowing orbs, three of them shining brightly in the sky with a red-orange color.  they seemed to be traveling in my direct and appeared in the sky for about 3 minutes.  we all walked out on the lawn to try to determine what it was.  the light spacing looked very consistent if there would have been four lights together, with the third light away from me not lit up.  the continued to travel towards us and then the furtesh light faded away and the the middle light faded and then the closest light faded away.  
we all discussed what we had seen and agreed it was something we could not explain.  the lights looked like they were at least five mils away but were very bright and clearly stood out in the night sky.
content.summary: Saw large blue pulse and then one minute later saw 3 brightly glowing orbs
